function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low relative humidity increases the risk of infection","Impact":"Increased transmission of SARS-CoV-2 in buildings","Mitigation":"Ensure proper humidification when relative humidity is below 40%","Technologies":"Humidification systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management or facilities team"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation increases the risk of transmission","Impact":"Higher likelihood of SARS-CoV-2 transmission in buildings","Mitigation":"Increase outdoor air supply and maintain effective airflow patterns","Technologies":"HVAC systems with proper operation, outdoor air dampers","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management or facilities team"},{"Description":"Ineffective air cleaning and filtration","Impact":"Risk of SARS-CoV-2 transmission due to contaminated air","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of air filters and use of portable room air cleaners","Technologies":"Regular filter maintenance, portable room air cleaners","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management or facilities team"}]}
